title: Quarkus Observability Roadmap 2023
content: Quarkus has come a long way in the observability space. Initial support for Tracing and Metrics came from MicroProfile and their respective implementations, SmallRye OpenTracing and SmallRye Metrics. Because the observability space evolved, these implementations expanded beyond the original specifications, and the Quarkus extensions providing Tracing and Metrics have been...
